EmailTemplate.name: 06_27_2014 VMworld Winner Notify.Announcement #3
EmailTemplate.subject: VMworld Sweepstakes | Congratulations, Ivan!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations, Ivan!
You have been selected as the FINAL recipient of two (2) Full Passes to VMworld® 2014 in San Francisco. Please contact VMTurbo Marketing Ops Manager Jenny Sharpe <mailto:jennifer.sharpe@vmturbo.com> to coordinate receiving your passes. Per our arrangement with VMworld, you will need to provide the name of your guest in order for us to designate a pass for them also.
By accepting your prize, you are acknowledging acceptance of the Sweepstakes Official Rules <http://go.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes-rules.html>.
Congratulations. 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
